autoPlay.name: Autoplay
autoPlay.description: When present, it specifies that the media should start playing automatically. For more info: https://www.w3schools.com/tags/att_video_autoplay.asp

loop.name: Loop
loop.description: When present, it specifies that the video will start over again, every time it is finished. For more info: https://www.w3schools.com/tags/att_video_loop.asp

muted.name: Muted
muted.description: When present, it specifies that the audio output of the video should be muted. For more info: https://www.w3schools.com/tags/att_video_muted.asp
